subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: During the first two full stages of the race, Discovery Channel riders have delivered Levi Leipheimer to the finish line close enough to the front to allow him to keep the race leader’s gold jersey.
snippet: During the first two full stages of the race, Discovery Channel riders have delivered Levi Leipheimer to the finish line close enough to the front to allow him to keep the race leader’s gold jersey.
